title: Roger Stone, associate of President Trump - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/22/17
itunes:title: Roger Stone, associate of President Trump - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/22/17
description:
George Noory and guest Roger Stone discuss his role as advisor to Donald Trump's successful campaign to win the Presidency, as well as allegations of interference by Russia and wiretapping.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
